description: Enterprise techniques used by FLORAHOX Activity, ATT&CK campaign C0053 (v1.0)
name: FLORAHOX Activity (C0053)

techniques.comment: [FLORAHOX Activity](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0053) has used acquired Virtual Private Servers as control systems for the ORB network.(Citation: ORB Mandiant)
[FLORAHOX Activity](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0053) has executed PHP and Shell scripts to identify and infect subsequent routers for the ORB network.(Citation: ORB Mandiant)

[FLORAHOX Activity](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0053) has executed multiple Bash controller scripts to provide command line inputs for FLORAHOX traversal configurations.(Citation: ORB Mandiant)
[FLORAHOX Activity](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0053) has compromised network routers and IoT devices for the ORB network.(Citation: ORB Mandiant)
[FLORAHOX Activity](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0053) has exploited and infected vulnerable routers to recruit additional network devices into the ORB.(Citation: ORB Mandiant)
[FLORAHOX Activity](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0053) has routed traffic through a customized [Tor](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0183) relay network layer.(Citation: ORB Mandiant)
